column3: Honey: Released March 22, 2016, by the National Agricultural Statistics Service (NASS), Agricultural Statistics Board, United States Department of Agriculture (USDA).
Number of Colonies, Yield, Production, Stocks, Price, and Value – States and United States: 2014
[Producers with 5 or more colonies that also qualify as a farm. Colonies which produced honey in more than one State were counted in each State]
